mapper.update:
update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_OPERATION_RULES
SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OPERATE_PEOPLE = #{operatePeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_START_TIME = #{operateStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_END_TIME = #{operateEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATING_TIME = #{operatingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATING_TYPE = #{operatingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where OPERATION_RULES_ID = #{operationRulesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_OPERATION_RULES set SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OPERATE_PEOPLE = #{operatePeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_START_TIME = #{operateStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_END_TIME = #{operateEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATING_TIME = #{operatingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATING_TYPE = #{operatingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OPERATION_RULES_ID = #{operationRulesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT A.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME, B.OPERATE_START_TIME, B.OPERATE_END_TIME FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT A LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_OPERATION_RULES B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.SCENIC_SPOT_ID WHERE A.SCENIC_SPOT_FID = #{scenicSpotFId}
select from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_OPERATION_RULES where SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId} group by OPERATE_PEOPLE order by CREATE_DATE DESC
